awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Gene Kelly and Fred Astaire present more golden moments from the MGM film library, this time including comedy and drama as well as classic musical numbers.

title: That's Entertainment, Part II
